title: Ziziphus jujuba
Chemical Constituents: Glycosides, flavanoids, nucleosides, organic acids and saponins
Therapeutic uses: To treat and nourish the stomach, tonify the spleen, and nourish the blood, as well as for overall nourishing and strength,  as anti-diabetes, tonic, aphrodisiac, hypnotic-sedative and anxiolytic, anticancer, antifungal, antibacterial, antiulcer, anti-inflammatory, cognitive, antispastic.
